"use strict";
const log_queue_1 = require("../logless/log-queue");
const uuid = require("uuid");
class Logless {
    constructor(source, event, context, callback, captureURL) {
        this.captureURL = captureURL;
        this._queue = null;
        this._source = source;
        this._event = event;
        this._context = context;
        this._wrappedCallback = callback;
        this.init();
        this._queue.enqueue(new log_queue_1.Log(log_queue_1.LogType.INFO, [event], ["request"]));
    }
    static capture(source, event, context) {
        return new Logless(source, event, context);
    }
    static captureWithCallback(source, event, context, callback) {
        return new Logless(source, event, context, callback);
    }
    init() {
        let self = this;
        this._queue = new log_queue_1.LogQueue(this);
        Iif (this._context.awsRequestId !== undefined && this._context.awsRequestId !== null) {
            this._transactionID = this._context.awsRequestId;
        }
        else {
            this._transactionID = uuid.v4();
        }
        this.wrapCall(console, "error", log_queue_1.LogType.ERROR);
        this.wrapCall(console, "info", log_queue_1.LogType.INFO);
        this.wrapCall(console, "log", log_queue_1.LogType.DEBUG);
        this.wrapCall(console, "warn", log_queue_1.LogType.WARN);
        let done = this.context().done;
        this.context().done = function (error, result) {
            self.logResponse(error, result);
            self._queue.flush();
            done(error, result);
        };
        let fail = this.context().fail;
        this.context().fail = function (error) {
            self.logResponse(error, null);
            self._queue.flush();
            fail(error);
        };
        let succeed = this.context().succeed;
        this.context().succeed = function (result) {
            self.logResponse(null, result);
            self._queue.flush();
            succeed(result);
        };
        if (this._wrappedCallback !== undefined && this._wrappedCallback !== null) {
            this._callback = function (error, result) {
                self.logResponse(error, result);
                self._queue.flush();
                self._wrappedCallback.call(this, error, result);
            };
        }
    }
    context() {
        return this._context;
    }
    callback() {
        return this._callback;
    }
    source() {
        return this._source;
    }
    wrapCall(console, name, type) {
        let self = this;
        let originalCall = console[name];
        console[name] = function (...data) {
            self._queue.enqueue(new log_queue_1.Log(type, data));
            originalCall.apply(this, data);
        };
    }
    transactionID() {
        return this._transactionID;
    }
    logResponse(error, result) {
        if (error !== undefined && error !== null) {
            this._queue.enqueue(new log_queue_1.Log(log_queue_1.LogType.ERROR, [error.message]));
        }
        else {
            this._queue.enqueue(new log_queue_1.Log(log_queue_1.LogType.INFO, [result], ["response"]));
        }
    }
}
exports.Logless = Logless;
